Interface::WindowData

Interface::WindowData Struct Reference

Structure containing all data that might update an Ogre GUI window. Flags dictate which fields are used; not all are used at once. More...

#include <Interface.h>

Detailed Description

Structure containing all data that might update an Ogre GUI window. Flags dictate which fields are used; not all are used at once.
